00004 #include "SimCore/UserTrackInformation.h"
00005 #include "Event/SimParticle.h"

00007 // Geant4
00008 #include "G4TrajectoryPoint.hh"
00009 #include "G4VProcess.hh"
00010 
00011 namespace ldmx {
00012 
00013     G4Allocator<Trajectory> TrajectoryAllocator;
00014 
00015     Trajectory::Trajectory(const G4Track* aTrack) :
00016             genStatus_(0) {
00017 
00018         // Copy basic info from the track.
00019         particleDef_ = aTrack->GetDefinition();
00020         mass_ = aTrack->GetDynamicParticle()->GetMass();
00021         trackID_ = aTrack->GetTrackID();
00022         parentID_ = aTrack->GetParentID();
00023         globalTime_ = aTrack->GetGlobalTime();
00024         vertexPosition_ = aTrack->GetVertexPosition();
00025         energy_ = aTrack->GetVertexKineticEnergy() + mass_;
00026 
00027         // Set the process type.
00028         const G4VProcess* process = aTrack->GetCreatorProcess();
00029         if (process) {
00030             const G4String& processName = process->GetProcessName();
00031             SimParticle::ProcessType processType = SimParticle::findProcessType(processName);
00032             processType_ = processType;
00033             // Uncomment this to see what process types are being saved.  --JM
00034             //std::cout << "Trajectory - set process type " << processType
00035             //        << " from <" << processName << ">" << std::endl;
00036         } else {
00037             processType_ = SimParticle::ProcessType::unknown;
00038         }
00039 
00040         // Set initial momentum from track information.
00041         UserTrackInformation* trackInfo = dynamic_cast<UserTrackInformation*>(aTrack->GetUserInformation());
00042         const G4ThreeVector& p = trackInfo->getInitialMomentum();
00043         initialMomentum_.set(p.x(), p.y(), p.z());
00044 
00045         // If the track has not been stepped, then only the first point is added.
00046         // Otherwise, the track has already been stepped so we add also its last location
00047         // which should be its endpoint.
00048         trajPoints_ = new TrajectoryPointContainer();
00049         trajPoints_->push_back(new G4TrajectoryPoint(aTrack->GetVertexPosition()));
00050         if (aTrack->GetTrackStatus() == G4TrackStatus::fStopAndKill) {
00051             trajPoints_->push_back(new G4TrajectoryPoint(aTrack->GetPosition()));
00052         }
00053     }
00054 
00055     Trajectory::~Trajectory() {
00056         // Delete trajectory points and their container.
00057         size_t i;
00058         for (i = 0; i < trajPoints_->size(); i++) {
00059             delete (*trajPoints_)[i];
00060         }
00061         trajPoints_->clear();
00062         delete trajPoints_;
00063     }
00064 
00065     void Trajectory::AppendStep(const G4Step* aStep) {
00066         trajPoints_->push_back(new G4TrajectoryPoint(aStep->GetPostStepPoint()->GetPosition()));
00067     }
00068 
00069     G4int Trajectory::GetTrackID() const {
00070         return trackID_;
00071     }
00072 
00073     G4int Trajectory::GetParentID() const {
00074         return parentID_;

00082         return particleDef_->GetPDGCharge();
00083     }

00086         return particleDef_->GetPDGEncoding();
00087     }

00089     G4ThreeVector Trajectory::GetInitialMomentum() const {
00090         return initialMomentum_;
00091     }
00092 
00093     int Trajectory::GetPointEntries() const {
00094         return trajPoints_->size();
00095     }
00096 
00097     G4VTrajectoryPoint* Trajectory::GetPoint(G4int i) const {
00098         return (*trajPoints_)[i];
00099     }
00100 
00101     void Trajectory::MergeTrajectory(G4VTrajectory* secondTrajectory) {
00102         if (secondTrajectory == NULL) {
00103             return;
00104         }
00105 
00106         Trajectory* seco = (Trajectory*) secondTrajectory;
00107         G4int ent = seco->GetPointEntries();
00108         for (int i = 1; i < ent; i++) {
00109             trajPoints_->push_back((*(seco->trajPoints_))[i]);
00110         }
00111         delete (*seco->trajPoints_)[0];
00112         seco->trajPoints_->clear();
00113     }
00114 
00115     const G4ThreeVector& Trajectory::getEndPoint() const {
00116         return GetPoint(GetPointEntries() - 1)->GetPosition();
00117     }
00118 
00119     G4double Trajectory::getEnergy() const {
00120         return energy_;

00136         return vertexPosition_;

00139     void Trajectory::setGenStatus(int theGenStatus) {
00140         genStatus_ = theGenStatus;
00141     }
00142 
00143     Trajectory* Trajectory::findByTrackID(G4TrajectoryContainer* trajCont, int trackID) {
00144         TrajectoryVector* vec = trajCont->GetVector();
00145         for (TrajectoryVector::const_iterator it = vec->begin(); it != vec->end(); it++) {
00146             if ((*it)->GetTrackID() == trackID) {
00147                 return dynamic_cast<Trajectory*>(*it);
00148             }
00149         }
00150         return nullptr;
00151     }
